summary:
Just a simple mod to add a place for sleeping and stashing gear when starting a new game.
Its under the bridge inside Whiterun at the entrance.
descriptionHtml:
Just a simple mod to add a place for sleeping and stashing gear when starting a new game.
Its under the bridge inside Whiterun at the entrance.

Inspired by BarronTV1's awesome Whiterun bridge den mod. A very nice mod.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26409/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26409/?[/url]

!Also, its not compatible with the above mod and any that edit the same area.!
In case it wasnt obvious. xD

But his mod is a little too... nice for my taste, considering the location. xD
Its not what im looking for nor could i find any other mod like this so i made my own.
The idea behind it is, im always playing on uber hard difficulity with many mods that add even more hard gameplay.
The only problem with that is that earning gold for a house,
you need lots of work and time to get enough gold... or be the Kings cousin. xD
And there is no real place to stash stuff, while its absolutlly vital.
You tend to look for a place to stash when even gold and arrows have weight. xD
So i wanted something that wont replace a house, be as less intrusive as possible and rather make you work even harder for one,
yet provide the most basic needs, sleep and stash.
The bed is more or less needed here but it made it look much better, otherwise would be too empty.
Didnt want to add any clutter, because i imagine you could actually take stuff and place real clutter around.
More immersive in my opinion.
And because its abbandoned and its you who settels in, you are supposed to make it clutter and not me. If you get the idea.
Rather than convince you like any other game that you or any other person lived there all along even if its empty for years.
Game logic does that sometimes. Or rather, all the time. xD

I know there are lots of home mods, but i needed something specific for the start off.
And you will travel to whiterun a lot and with, for instance, fast travel disabled,
you will appriciate something nearby.

In any case, enjoy.

Free Content
Do what ever you want with it.

Monetized Content
You are not permitted to re-upload this to any other site or
use any part of this mod in your own mod.
author: theimmersion
